com.oregonscientific.meep.msm
Class ServerMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.oregonscientific.meep.msm.ServerMessageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerEventListener
public class ServerMessageHandler
extends Object
implements ServerEventListener

A handler that handles messaging between client and the MEEP server

Author:
Stanley Lam

Constructor Detail

ServerMessageHandler

public ServerMessageHandler(Context context)
Construct a new server message handler

Parameters:
context - The context the handler runs in, through which it can access other system services
Method Detail

isLoggedIn

public boolean isLoggedIn()
Determines whether the a user is authenticated with MEEP server

Returns:
true if the user has been authenticated, false otherwise

registerReceiver

public void registerReceiver(ComponentName component,
                             com.oregonscientific.meep.msm.MessageFilter filter)
Register a component to be run when a Message received matches the filter

Parameters:
component - Name of the component to handle the message
filter - The filter the message to match against

unregisterReceiver

public void unregisterReceiver(ComponentName component)
Unregister a previously registered component. All filters that have been registered for the component will be removed

Parameters:
component - The component to unregister

start

public void start(boolean autoReconnect)
Starts to handle messages between the MEEP and server

Parameters:
autoReconnect - If true, the handler will automatically try to reconnect with the server if connection was lost. Otherwise, the MEEP will remain disconnected with server if connection was lost.

stop

public void stop()
Stops the handler from handling messages. All unsent messages will remain and the handler will try to resend them upon restart

setTimeout

public void setTimeout(long timeout)
                throws ServerConnectionException
Sets the connection timeout period

Parameters:
timeout - The new timeout period
Throws:
ServerConnectionException - Thrown if timeout is less than 1

Determine whether or not the given message is a sign-in request

Parameters:
message - The message to determine whether or not it was a sign-in request
Returns:

protected boolean isIMConversationMessage(com.oregonscientific.meep.msm.Message<?> message)
Determine whether or not the given message is a chat text message

Parameters:
message - The message to determine whether or not it was a sign-in request
Returns:
